addAccount.activeAccountHint: Active accounts are used for making BURST transactions. Requires user generate a passphrase or provide one. Requires a user create a PIN for transactions. The passphrase is only used once locally to encrypt your private key; it is not stored anywhere.
addAccount.passiveAccountHint: Passive accounts are useful if you know a BURST address, but don't intend on making any transactions. Adds increased security. Can be converted to an active account at any time.
addAccount.title: Add account

createAccount.enterPin: Enter a pin to secure your account. The pin is used to verify actions made with your account.
createAccount.howToGenerate: Move your finger across the area to create a random seed for the password generation.
createAccount.notePassphraseHint: Note down your passphrase. The passphrase is the master key to your account. Therefore, keep your passphrase always safe and private!
createAccount.title: Create account
